Luxury Hotels.description: Provide high-end amenities and services. Often have fine dining restaurants, spa facilities, and premium accommodations.

Boutique Hotels.description: Small, stylish, and often themed hotels. Emphasize personalized service and unique design.

Resorts.description: Located in scenic or vacation destinations. Offer a range of recreational facilities and activities.

Business Hotels.description: Cater to business travelers. Typically located in business districts and offer conference facilities.

Budget or Economy Hotels.description: Offer basic accommodations at affordable prices. May lack extensive amenities.

Extended Stay Hotels.description: Suited for long-term stays. Equipped with kitchenettes or full kitchens.

Airport Hotels.description: Located near airports for convenience. Cater to travelers with short layovers or early/late flights.

Suite Hotels.description: Provide larger rooms or suites with separate living and sleeping areas.

Bed and Breakfast (B&B).description: Offer overnight accommodations and breakfast. Often in smaller, more intimate settings.

Hostels.description: Budget-friendly accommodations with shared facilities. Popular among backpackers and budget travelers.

Motel.description: Typically located along highways or in suburban areas. Emphasize convenient parking for travelers with vehicles.

Cabin or Lodge.description: Located in rural or wilderness settings. Provide a rustic and nature-oriented experience.

Casino Hotels.description: Integrated with a casino. Offer a range of entertainment options.

Historic Hotels.description: Located in historic buildings or landmarks. Emphasize historical significance and charm.

All-Inclusive Resorts.description: Include accommodation, meals, drinks, and some activities in a bundled package.

Spa Resorts.description: Focus on health and wellness. Offer spa treatments and wellness programs.

Conference Centers.description: Specialized in hosting conferences and events. Equipped with meeting rooms and facilities.

Floating Hotels.description: Located on water bodies such as rivers or oceans. Offer a unique experience.

Pet-Friendly Hotels.description: Accommodate guests with pets. Provide pet-friendly amenities and services.
